item.title: Tobias Pulls
item.description: A cybersecurity researcher in the forests of Värmland, Sweden, that cares deeply about privacy, human rights, and democracy. Working as a senior lecturer (docent ≈ associate professor) in Computer Science at Karlstad University, Sweden. I have collaborated on a range of topics in projects funded by EU {H2020, FP6, FP7, TEMPUS}, Google, Mullvad VPN, the NLnet Foundation, the Swedish Foundation for Strategic Research, the Swedish Internet Foundation, the Swedish Knowledge Foundation, and more.
